question:
Mukya Mantri Dal Poshit Yojana was launched in Uttrakhand. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. Under this scheme the central government will provide 15 kg of pulses at a subsidised rate.
  2. This scheme will provide to meet the carbohydrate requirement.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: Under this scheme, the State government will provide various pulses at a subsidised rate. It will provide the eligible beneficiaries and the ration card holders with 2kg of pulses at a subsidised rate. These pulses include chana, malka and masur. Statement 2 is incorrect: This scheme provides to meet the protein requirements of the state. This scheme will be a tool to achieve PMâ€™s vision of a healthy India. Under this scheme, about 23.32 lakhs ration cards will be provided to the respective beneficiaries.
